Hardware Abstraction Layer (HAL)
Macros
Overrideable Macros

General Description

These macros can be defined to a custom value globally to modify the behavior of the HAL.

Macros

#define CYHAL_ISR_PRIORITY_DEFAULT   (7) /* TODO: port specific value */
 

Macro Definition Documentation

◆ CYHAL_ISR_PRIORITY_DEFAULT

#define CYHAL_ISR_PRIORITY_DEFAULT   (7) /* TODO: port specific value */

Priority that is applied by default to all drivers when initalized. Priorities can be overridden on each driver as part of enabling events.
